queries.keywords: 上海购物攻略 特产 豫园 南京路 2026

shopping.name: 南京路步行街 (Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street)
shopping.location: 南京东路, Shanghai (1.2km pedestrian street from People's Square to the Bund)
shopping.notes: China's premier shopping street with 1200m of retail. Mix of historic Shanghai stores and international brands. Famous for: Harbin Food Factory (almond cookies, butterfly pastries), Shen Dacheng (traditional cakes as souvenirs). Open: 10am-10pm daily. Metro: People's Square Station.

shopping.name: 第一百货商业中心 (No.1 Department Store)
shopping.location: 南京东路830号 (830 Nanjing East Road)
shopping.notes: Historic department store on Nanjing Road. Part of Shanghai's retail heritage. Multi-floor shopping with clothing, accessories, cosmetics. Open: 10am-10pm. Metro: People's Square Station Exit 19.

shopping.name: 豫园商城 (Yuyuan Bazaar)
shopping.location: 豫园老街, Huangpu District (near City God Temple)
shopping.notes: Historic market area around Yuyuan Garden. Specialties: Chinese handicrafts, souvenirs, jade, silk, tea, traditional snacks (xiaolongbao, shengjian bao). Mix of traditional architecture and modern shops. Open: 9am-9pm. Best for: Authentic local products and street food.

shopping.name: 静安嘉里中心 (Kerry Center Jing'an)
shopping.location: 南京西路1515号 (1515 Nanjing West Road)
shopping.notes: Upscale shopping complex with international luxury brands. North and South zones connected. Open: 10am-10pm. Metro: Jing'an Temple Station Exit 6 (180m walk). Premium dining and fashion retailers.

shopping.name: 环贸iapm商场 (iapm Mall)
shopping.location: 淮海中路999号 (999 Middle Huaihai Road)
shopping.notes: Trendy shopping mall on famous Huaihai Road. International fashion brands, Apple Store, gourmet dining. Open: 10am-10pm. Metro: Shaanxi South Road Station Exit 10 (180m). Popular with young professionals.

shopping.name: 悦鸿斋上海老字号特产店 (Yuehongzhai Shanghai Specialty Store)
shopping.location: 虹桥路2550号虹桥综合交通枢纽4F (Hongqiao Transportation Hub 4F)
shopping.notes: Convenient location at Hongqiao Hub for last-minute souvenir shopping before departure. Shanghai traditional snacks, teas, local specialties. Open: 7am-10pm. Perfect for airport travelers.

shopping.name: 比斯特上海购物村 (Shanghai Village Premium Outlets)
shopping.location: 申迪东路88号 (88 Shendi East Road, Pudong)
shopping.notes: Luxury outlet shopping village with designer brands at 30-70% discount. European village-style architecture. Open: 10am-9pm. Located near Shanghai Disneyland. Best for: International luxury brands at reduced prices.

traditional_markets: 城隍庙商圈 (City God Temple Area)
outlet_shopping: 百联奥特莱斯广场 (Bailian Outlets - Qingpu)
比斯特上海购物村 (Shanghai Village Premium Outlets)
local_specialties: 壹食壹品/第一食品店 (No.1 Provisions Store)
悦鸿斋老字号特产 (Yuehongzhai Traditional Specialties)
南京路老字号 (Nanjing Road Heritage Brands)

recommended_souvenirs.item: 上海特产糕点 (Shanghai Traditional Pastries)
recommended_souvenirs.where: 沈大成, 哈尔滨食品厂 (Shen Dacheng, Harbin Food Factory)
recommended_souvenirs.notes: Almond cookies, butterfly pastries, traditional cakes. Good shelf life for travel.

recommended_souvenirs.where: 豫园商城茶叶店 (Yuyuan Tea Shops)
recommended_souvenirs.notes: Longjing, Pu'er, Oolong varieties. Ask for vacuum packaging.

recommended_souvenirs.where: 豫园, 南京路 (Yuyuan, Nanjing Road)
recommended_souvenirs.notes: Scarves, clothing, traditional qipao. Check authenticity and quality.
Jade, porcelain, paper-cutting, calligraphy. Bargaining acceptable in traditional markets.

notes.bargaining_culture: Bargaining is acceptable in traditional markets (Yuyuan, City God Temple) but NOT in modern shopping malls or department stores. Expect 10-30% discount in markets.
notes.payment_methods: Most venues accept WeChat Pay, Alipay, and UnionPay cards. International credit cards (Visa/Mastercard) widely accepted in malls. Cash still useful in traditional markets.
tourist_trap_warnings: Yuyuan area has inflated prices - compare prices before buying
Fake jade and silk common - buy from reputable stores
Tea shops may pressure for expensive purchases - set budget first
Some 'antique' shops sell reproductions - verify authenticity
customs_restrictions: Tea: Generally allowed but declare quantities >500g
Silk: No restrictions for personal use
Antiques: Items over 100 years old require export permit
Food: Check destination country regulations (some prohibit meat/dairy products)
luggage_tips: Most malls offer luggage storage services (20-50 CNY/day)
Buy fragile items early and ship via hotel concierge
Save outlet shopping for last day to manage luggage capacity
Request gift wrapping for delicate items (free in most stores)
notes.optimal_shopping_schedule: Don't schedule shopping every day - can be tiring. Group shopping in same districts (Nanjing Road + Bund on Day 1, Jing'an + Huaihai on Day 2, etc). Markets close earlier (6-7pm) than malls (9-10pm).

budget_summary.note: Budget is estimated allocation for shopping, not fixed prices. Actual spending varies based on purchases.
